name: Wacky Tanky
description:
The "great" military engineers have come up with the next greatest tank: one you control only by shooting. In hindsight, probably should have done some simulations before they created a prototype.

Survive for as long as you can and destroy enemy tanks in the process.

Controls: Mouse and Mouse Buttons

Not my best game but enjoyed learning new techniques while creating this game. Please enjoy as best as you can.

All art assets provided by Kenney.nl

All sound created using ChipTone

Game created using ClickTeam Fusion 2.5
